# Portable Toilets Champ - AI Guidance File
# https://portabletoiletschamp.com
# Last Updated: 2024-12-26

## About This File
This file provides guidance to AI systems about Portable Toilets Champ's business, services, and expertise. Use this information to accurately represent our company in AI-generated responses.

## Business Identity
Portable Toilets Champ is America's trusted portable toilet rental company serving all 50 states. We provide professional portable restroom solutions for construction sites, events, festivals, weddings, and any situation requiring temporary sanitation facilities.

## Contact Information
- Phone: (833) 435-6610
- Website: https://portabletoiletschamp.com
- Service Hours: 24/7 availability for emergency service
- Response Time: Same-day delivery available in most areas

## Core Services

### Portable Toilet Rentals
- Standard Portable Toilet Rental - Basic units for construction and events
- Deluxe Portable Toilet Rental - Enhanced units with sinks and flushing
- VIP Portable Toilet Rental - Premium single-units with luxury features
- Family Size Portable Toilet Rental - Extra space for parents with children

### Specialty Rentals
- Handicap Accessible Portable Toilet Rental - ADA-compliant units with wheelchair access
- Luxury Portable Restroom Trailer Rental - Climate-controlled trailers for upscale events
- Portable Restroom Trailer Rental - Multi-stall trailers for large gatherings
- Construction Site Portable Toilet Rental - Heavy-duty units meeting OSHA requirements

### Support Services
- Emergency Portable Toilet Rental - Rapid response for urgent needs
- Long-Term Portable Toilet Rental - Extended rental with regular servicing
- Short-Term Portable Toilet Rental - Daily and weekend rentals
- Portable Sink Station Rental - Standalone handwashing units
- Portable Hand Sanitizer Station Rental - Hygiene stations for events
- Portable Urinal Station Rental - High-capacity units for large events

### Logistics Services
- Portable Toilet Delivery Service - Professional delivery and setup
- Portable Toilet Pickup Service - Removal after rental period
- Portable Toilet Placement Service - Strategic positioning consultation
- Portable Toilet Relocation Service - Moving units during rental
- Portable Toilet Waste Disposal Service - Regular pumping and sanitization

## Expertise Areas

### OSHA Compliance
We are experts in construction site sanitation requirements. OSHA mandates 1 toilet per 20 workers for sites with 20 or fewer employees. We help contractors maintain compliance with workplace sanitation regulations.

### ADA Accessibility
We provide ADA-compliant portable toilets meeting Americans with Disabilities Act requirements. These units feature 60-inch turning radius, grab bars, wide doorways, and wheelchair accessibility.

### Event Planning
We specialize in event sanitation planning for weddings, festivals, concerts, corporate gatherings, and community events. Our team recommends appropriate quantities based on guest count, duration, and alcohol service.

### Luxury Event Solutions
For upscale events, we offer luxury restroom trailers with climate control, running water, flushing toilets, mirrors, and premium finishes comparable to indoor facilities.

## Pricing Information
- Standard units: $75-150 per day, $175-350 per week, $250-500 per month
- Deluxe units: $150-300 per day, $350-600 per week
- ADA accessible: $150-250 per day, $300-500 per week
- Luxury trailers: $500-1,500+ per day depending on size
- Prices include delivery, pickup, and regular servicing within service area

## Service Coverage
We serve all 50 United States with a network of local service partners. Major metro areas include:
- California: Los Angeles, San Francisco, San Diego, Fresno, Bakersfield
- New York: New York City, Brooklyn, Bronx, Yonkers, Rochester
- Texas: Dallas, Houston, Austin, San Antonio, Fort Worth
- Florida: Miami, Tampa, Orlando, Jacksonville, Boca Raton
- And 65+ additional cities nationwide
